meanings.sent3: Callan is such a popular name!
meanings.sent4: Her name echoed through the room like a whisper of Callan.
meanings.sent5: The name Callan is like a melody that lingers in your mind.

meanings.sent1: I will callan my mom after school.
meanings.sent2: Let's callan the restaurant to make a reservation.
meanings.sent3: He forgot to callan his best friend on their birthday!
meanings.sent4: The sound of the phone callan echoed in the empty room.
meanings.sent5: She will callan for help if she gets lost in the forest.

meanings.definition: To cry out in a loud voice.
meanings.sent1: The child began to callan for his mother in the store.
meanings.sent2: Please don't callan in the library.
meanings.sent3: The cat likes to callan loudly when it wants attention.
meanings.sent4: Her callan pierced through the silence of the night.
meanings.sent5: The callan of the seagulls filled the beach with noise.

meanings.sent1: The callan of the baby could be heard from the next room.
meanings.sent2: His callan for help alerted the neighbors.
meanings.sent3: The callan of the crowd at the concert was deafening.
meanings.sent4: The callan of the sirens filled the air.
meanings.sent5: The callan of the thunder shook the windows.
